QuestData.Title: The Truth of the Grave
QuestData.Description: Earlier on, I saw a young Forsaken woman running towards the old inn. She was screaming for her life, pleading to be taken back home.$b$bNot all of us are as resolute as others, $n. Even so, we must accept our fate as undead if we are to rise up against those that would put us down.$b$bTake my hand mirror and show it to the young woman. She needs to see what she really is, and join us in our cause. Besides... we can use all the bodies that we can get.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Lilian Voss inside the large inn in Deathknell. Then speak with her to show her Elreth's Hand Mirror.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you spoken with her yet? She needs to be shown the truth.
QuestData.RewardText: You say she ran away? What a shame.$b$bVery well. As long as she's maintained her free will, there's still hope.
